mapper.select: select c1.CODE as country_code, c1.NAME as country_name, c1.CONTINENT as country_continent, c1.region as couintry_region, c1.SURFACE_AREA as country_surface_area, c1.INDEP_YEAR as country_indep_year, c1.POPULATION as country_population, c1.LIFE_EXPECTANCY as country_life_expectancy, c1.gnp as country_gnp, c1.GNP_OLD as country_gnp_old, c1.LOCAL_NAME as country_local_name, c1.GOVERNMENT_FORM as country_government_form, c1.HEAD_OF_STATE as country_head_of_state, c1.CAPITAL as country_capital, c1.CODE2 as country_code2, c2.ID as city_id, c2.NAME as city_name, c2.COUNTRY_CODE as city_country_code, c2.DISTRICT as city_district, c2.POPULATION as city_population from country c1 left outer join city c2 on c1.CODE = c2.COUNTRY_CODE where c1.code='KOR'
select c.*, c.code as country_code from country c offset #{firstItem}-1 rows fetch next #{itemsPerPage} rows only

select c1.CODE as country_code, c1.NAME as country_name, c1.CONTINENT as country_continent, c1.region as couintry_region, c1.SURFACE_AREA as country_surface_area, c1.INDEP_YEAR as country_indep_year, c1.POPULATION as country_population, c1.LIFE_EXPECTANCY as country_life_expectancy, c1.gnp as country_gnp, c1.GNP_OLD as country_gnp_old, c1.LOCAL_NAME as country_local_name, c1.GOVERNMENT_FORM as country_government_form, c1.HEAD_OF_STATE as country_head_of_state, c1.CAPITAL as country_capital, c1.CODE2 as country_code2, c2.ID as city_id, c2.NAME as city_name, c2.COUNTRY_CODE as city_country_code, c2.DISTRICT as city_district, c2.POPULATION as city_population from country c1 left outer join city c2 on c1.CODE = c2.COUNTRY_CODE where c1.code=#{code}
